CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Person_Involved_Relationship__c , 'Father'), ISPICKVAL( Person_Involved_Relationship__c, 'Mother')), IF( ISPICKVAL(Victim__r.Gender__c, 'Male'), 'Son', IF(ISPICKVAL(Victim__r.Gender__c, 'Female'), 'Daughter', '')),IF(OR(ISPICKVAL( Person_Involved_Relationship__c , 'Uncle'), ISPICKVAL( Person_Involved_Relationship__c , 'Aunt')), IF(ISPICKVAL( Victim__r.Gender__c, 'Male'), 'Nephew', IF(ISPICKVAL( Victim__r.Gender__c, 'Female'), 'Niece', '')), ''))
CustomField.label: Victim Relationship
